documentation.text: @notice Increments the cumulative ad views by 1.
@notice Increments the cumulative ad queued by 1.

@notice Retrieves the remaining available ad spend from the Treasury for this campaign, subtracting out all allocated pending spend
 @return The available ad spend.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Campaign fund withdraw can only be initiated by approved campaign withdraw address."

arguments.value: Campaign fund withdraw can only be initiated by approved campaign withdraw address.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Campaign fund withdraw can only be initiated by approved campaign withdraw address."

params.initiator: The address of the campaign initiator.
params.treasury: The address of the treasury contract.

withdrawSpend(uint256).details: Only the approved campaign withdraw address can initiate this and receive the withdrawn assets

constructor.notice: Creates a new Campaign contract instance.

depositSpend(uint256,address).notice: Deposits a specified amount to the campaign fund, adding to campaign spend

incCumulativeAdQueued().notice: Increments the cumulative ad queued by 1.

incCumulativeAdViews().notice: Increments the cumulative ad views by 1.

remainingAvailableAdSpend().notice: Retrieves the remaining available ad spend from the Treasury for this campaign, subtracting out all allocated pending spend

withdrawSpend(uint256).notice: Withdraws a specified amount from the campaign fund.

userdoc.notice: This contract is ad campaign contract logic
